metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7206 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The ff_h2645_extract_rbsp function in libavcodec in libav 9.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) or obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted h264 video file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to below bug ticket, ffmpeg is not affected even though the code is similar https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=872517

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
